name: warped-contracts
description: Main collection of scripts and utils for Warped

scripts.verify:WarpedTaxHandler: npx hardhat verify [address of deployed WarpedTaxHandler contract (find from the log of above deploy script)] --network goerli --constructor-args ./scripts/verify/args/taxHandler.js
scripts.verify:WarpedToken: npx hardhat verify [address of deployed WarpedToken contract (find from the log of above deploy script)] --network goerli --constructor-args ./scripts/verify/args/token.js
scripts.verify:WarpedTokenManager: npx hardhat verify [address of deployed WarpedTokenManager contract] --network goerli --constructor-args ./scripts/verify/args/tokenManager.js
scripts.verify:WarpedTreasuryHandler: npx hardhat verify [address of deployed WarpedTreasuryHandler contract (find from the log of above deploy script)] --network goerli [WarpedTokenManager contract address]

author: Warped Studios
